pullrequest.title: [gazebo11] Add helper function PhysicsEngine::any_cast to handle std::any

content.raw:
> I do wonder if the any_cast function be in PresetManager.hh since the values being cast are coming from there

You are correct that `PresetManager` is the source of this behavior, but the `PhysicsEngine::GetParam` function is used much more frequently than anything from `PresetManager`, which is why I thought the function should go there.

> There's also a CastAnyValue function in PresetManager.cc. Do we need to handle std::any objects there as well?

in 6032e8a, I've updated `CastAnyValue` to use `PhysicsEngine::any_cast` and added a test. I hadn't noticed it because the tests were passing
content.html:
I do wonder if the any_cast function be in PresetManager.hh since the values being cast are coming from there

You are correct that PresetManager is the source of this behavior, but the PhysicsEngine::GetParam function is used much more frequently than anything from PresetManager, which is why I thought the function should go there.

There's also a CastAnyValue function in PresetManager.cc. Do we need to handle std::any objects there as well?

in 6032e8a, I've updated CastAnyValue to use PhysicsEngine::any_cast and added a test. I hadn't noticed it because the tests were passing
